subject: Re: [junit] debugging techniques
msgSnippet: Don t. Write simpler tests until you the problem is clear. If System.out is being redirected, then JUnit is not doing it. ... J. B. Rainsberger, President,
messageBody:
Don't. Write simpler tests until you the problem is clear.

If System.out is being redirected, then JUnit is not doing it.

>So said junitguy on 4/21/2003 --------------------
>I tried to use System.out.println() to print the values of variables,
>but the output seems to be redirected. How do I debug tests?
>
>
>Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
